response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $1,500,000 to you. To ensure we reach a mutually beneficial agreement, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $1,200,000. This special offer is designed to provide you with significant savings while securing your investment in a high-quality asset. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
